Text:
Hi, I'm just wondering which one of Kili's DVDs this is, since she has released a few Hula workouts for beginners. 

Is this the one from 2003 that has the "Hula Rock" etc, or one of the more traditional ones..? 

My connection is a tad slow so I'd be really grateful if someone could tell me so I don't have to download it first to see if I want it... Thanks!
